title: Obama Asks For Global Help Undercutting Radical Ideology
teaser: The White House conference on countering violent extremism is seeking a way to broaden the world's response beyond military intervention. At the meeting's last day on Thursday, President Obama said the U.S. is at war with terror, not Islam.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
